attributes.title: Dothraki crone
attributes.6: yes==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, the lead member of the ''dosh khaleen'', who gives the prophecy about Rhaego being the Stallion Who Mounts the World, has only one eye.==References==ReflistCategory:CharactersCategory:Minor CharactersCategory:Status: AliveCategory:DothrakiCategory:Unnamed CharactersCategory:Characters from the Dothraki Sea

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the lead member of the ''dosh khaleen'', who gives the prophecy about Rhaego being the Stallion Who Mounts the World, has only one eye.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
She presides over a ceremony to predict the future of [[Daenerys Targaryen]]'s unborn child, and declares that he will be the [[Stallion Who Mounts the World]].<ref>"[[A Golden Crown]]"</ref>
